title: Talon damage is a little stupid or it's just me?
body:
He killed me!

I was at lvl 3, he was at lvl 3
i had more than 70% life and he was 50 or more.
He jumped used ignite, and puff... i was dead.

I did not even had time to understand wtf hapened.
Is this stupidity normal?

replies.body: As a {{champion:91}}  player, PLEASE DO NOT STAND IN HIS W. HIS PASSIVE WILL HURT YOU A LOT EARLY-MID GAME.
WILL HURT YOU A LOT EARLY-MID GAME = kill you if he jumps and ignite?

> [{quoted}](name=VisArch,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLqJaAMK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-06T17:26:26.234+0000)
>
> WILL HURT YOU A LOT EARLY-MID GAME = kill you if he jumps and ignite?

YES, HE HAS ONE OF THE HIGHEST LEVEL 2-3 BURSTS IN THE GAME

If he q's onto you, and you die that fast, you obviously were struck by both parts of his w.

You need to pay attention to what his passive does, my man


Hitting 3 abilities will cause Talon's next basic attack DEAL HEAVY BLEED DAMAGE, SCALING WITH HIS BONUS AD (thankfully, not total.) If you combine this rapid bleed with ignite AND electrocute, HE WILL kill you VERY QUICKLY. His bleed isn't the same as Darius's (Where his slowly does minor dot over time until he reaches five stacks.) Talon's bleed last 2-3 seconds, and remember IT'S HEAVY DAMAGE. This is why "Talon scores 25% of first bloods" is such a meme, because squishies in mid will DIE VERY FAST from levels 2-3. DO NOT. PLAY. SQUISHY. IMMOBILE. MAGES. AGAINST HIM.

Thank you so mutch.
I will be more carefull next time i face him again.

But I wish there was more I could do than just stay away from him and his "w"... so sad.

{{champion:8}}  and {{champion:131}} are the easiest to play against them. Vlad can stay safe out of range and immediately use his w to escape Talon's damage. (Even if you lose a trade, you can heal it all back up) 

Diana can spam her w shield to negate most of talon's burst, and beat the crap out of his post 6 with her ability to all in and keep him from escaping

> [{quoted}](name=VisArch,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sLqJaAMK,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-03-06T18:39:56.542+0000)
>
> At lvl 3 its a bit hard...

At level 3 he'll have two levels in his W and one in his Q. Try to stay at the edge of his W range so that he can't W > Q > auto you and bully him with your range advantage. If he pokes you with his W, step to the side so that the returning blades won't give him a second stack on you. Play off of your minion waves and you should do fine.

His Q has a range of 575, less than the range of an auto attack of most ADCs in the game. Almost every caster in the game has more range on many of their abilities than that, and can poke him hard if he gets too close. 

Hope that helps!
